remarks: The image structure's scalar multiplication is closed in the base set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Feb-2015.)
statement:
imasvscaf.u $e |- ( ph -> U = ( F "s R ) ) $.
imasvscaf.v $e |- ( ph -> V = ( Base ` R ) ) $.
imasvscaf.f $e |- ( ph -> F : V -onto-> B ) $.
imasvscaf.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Z ) $.
imasvscaf.g $e |- G = ( Scalar ` R ) $.
imasvscaf.k $e |- K = ( Base ` G ) $.
imasvscaf.q $e |- .x. = ( .s ` R ) $.
imasvscaf.s $e |- .xb = ( .s ` U ) $.
imasvscaf.e $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( p e. K /\ a e. V /\ q e. V ) ) -> ( ( F ` a ) = ( F ` q ) -> ( F ` ( p .x. a ) ) = ( F ` ( p .x. q ) ) ) ) $.
imasvscaf.c $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( p e. K /\ q e. V ) ) -> ( p .x. q ) e. V ) $.
imasvscaf $p |- ( ph -> .xb : ( K X. B ) --> B ) $.
$d .x. p q $.
$d .xb a p q $.
$d B p q $.
$d F a p q $.
$d K a p q $.
$d R p q $.
$d V a p q $.
$d a p ph q $.
$d p q $.
